text: "Baby Be Mine" is a song by American singer-songwriter Michael Jackson from his iconic 1982 album Thriller. The track was written by Rod Temperton and produced by Quincy Jones, and it features a smooth, romantic vibe that showcases Jackson's vocal talents. While it wasn't released as a single, it has gained popularity over the years and is appreciated for its catchy melody and heartfelt lyrics. The song reflects themes of love and desire, typical of much of Jackson's work during that era. "Baby Be Mine" is often noted for its infectious groove and arrangement, which blends elements of pop, R&B;, and funk. Category:1982 songs Category:Michael Jackson songs
title: Baby Be Mine (Michael Jackson song)
